title: Martin Van Buren National Historic Site: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             Park News         The Albany Argus was the newspaper of the Martin Van Buren's political machine which was known as the Albany Regency.   artin Van Buren National Historic Site regularly announces news about the park and activities. Click the links below to see recent press releases.        Presidential Papers, Presidential Politics - Special Lindenwald Program in Hudson July 19 Join us in Hudson for a very special introduction to two projects that will increase access to President Van Buren’s letters.      MVBee –The history and beauty of native bees June 25  Join illustrator Emily Brooks and naturalist Conrad Vispo on Saturday afternoon June 25, to learn about native bee species and techniques for illustrating them and their habitats.
